question: N Gopalaswami committee, sometimes seen in news, is associated with which of the following?
option1: Determining the vulnerability of guarding structures along the Indo-Myanmar border
option2: Quality enhancement in higher education institutes of India
option3: Monitoring of high bad loan divergences and bank frauds
option4: To study the feasibility of dispensing homoeopathic medicines in villages by rural health workers and accredited social health activists (ASHA)
answer: Quality enhancement in higher education institutes of India
explanation: Recently, the Prime Minister’s Office, appointed the former Chief Election Commissioner N Gopalaswami as the head of a committee that will select 20 institutes of higher education in India that will be developed into “world-class” institutes. The committee will select 20 Institutions of Eminence from among 104 institutions. These Institutions of Eminence are proposed to have greater autonomy compared to other higher education institutions. Such institutions will have autonomy to decide their fee for domestic and foreign students and have a flexible course duration and structure.
